/* RIM patent infringement litigation */ Removed a highly POV statment.
Base system memory on 8220, Bold and Storm is 128Mb, I left off the 1Gb of internal storage used in the Bold.
/* Name origin */ put RIM in [[]] to turn it into a hyperlink
clean up, Replaced: pp. 259-278 → pp. 259–278 (2) using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Reverted 2 edits by [[Special:Contributions/128.12.77.43|128.12.77.43]]; Unsourced dubious information. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
I removed the word "unique". To say "unique id" means that a Blackberry has only one id, which is obvious, and not the point. Rather, the id determines a unique *device*. It's now clear and correct.
/* CPU */ That didn't make sense. If it's incorrect, I apologize.
